text: Kahom, ki maim tuhanu dasam, alaha de kolom natije de anusara bura fala pa'una vale kihare loka hana?Uha jisa upara alaha ne lahanata pa'i ate jisa upara usada krodha (pragata) ho'i'a ate jinham vicom bandara ate sura bana dite ga'e ate unham ne saitana di puja kiti. Ajihe loka halata de anusara zi'ada bure ate cage raha tom bahuta dura hana
